name: n8n
description: deploy n8n to heroku without any hassle

GENERIC_TIMEZONE.description: Time Zone to use with Heroku. You can find the name of your timezone for example here: https://momentjs.com/timezone/.

N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Set the n8n encryption key to a static value to avoid Heroku overriding it (causing authentication to fail).

WEBHOOK_URL.description: Replace <appname> with your Heroku application name. This will ensure the correct webhook URLs are being shown in n8n.

DB_POSTGRESDB_SSL_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED.description: SSL is required to connect to Postgres on Heroku

CLAUDE_CODE_OAUTH_TOKEN.description: OAuth token for the @anthropic-ai/claude-code CLI. Leave empty if you plan to authenticate later.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: GitHub personal access token for accessing GitHub API and repositories.

GCP_PROJECT_ID.description: Google Cloud Project ID for launching Cloud Run jobs. Required if you want to use the launch-cloudrun command.

GCP_REGION.description: Google Cloud Region for Cloud Run jobs (e.g., us-central1, us-west1, europe-west1). Defaults to us-central1 if not specified.

CLOUDRUN_SERVICE_NAME.description: Name for the Cloud Run service/job. Defaults to 'claude-code-runner' if not specified.

GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY.description: Google Cloud Service Account Key in JSON format (base64 encoded). Required for authenticating with GCP to launch Cloud Run jobs. Create a service account with Cloud Run Admin and Storage Admin roles, download the JSON key, and base64 encode it.
